name: HuggingFaceFW/fineweb-2
description: The FineWeb2 dataset is a significant update to the original FineWeb dataset, offering pretraining data for an impressive 1000+ languages. This dataset is fully reproducible, available under the ODC-By 1.0 license, and has been extensively validated through hundreds of ablation experiments. It's a valuable resource for anyone working on multilingual NLP tasks, particularly language modeling.
